description: pedestrians and carriages on street, including woman with closed parasol under her arm, LLC; trees at left; buildings in background at left and right
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1990; sold in November for POOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Les Boulevards près du Vaudeville
